snippet: A group of the world's leading rich nations will support increasing sanctions against Russia if Moscow escalates the crisis in Ukraine, U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Says G7 Backs More Sanctions if Russia Escalates Ukraine Crisis
headline.main: U.S. Says G7 Backs More Sanctions if Russia Escalates Ukraine Crisis

lead_paragraph: A group of the world's leading rich nations will support increasing sanctions against Russia if Moscow escalates the crisis in Ukraine, U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew said on Friday.
